content:
I think I'll try out Method 1 using Trello's filtering and sorting feature. It seems like a simple way to get the total time spent on a list or board. Thanks for the tips!

By the way, since I'm already using Trello for project management, I was wondering if you could recommend any other Trello Power-Ups that might be useful for a senior engineer like me. Are there any Power-Ups that can help with code reviews, technical documentation, or team collaboration?
